num_rows.description: Approximate count of rows in this table

num_bytes.description: Approximate size of table as reported by BigQuery

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: transactions
metadata.comment:
All transactions.
Data is exported using https://github.com/blockchain-etl/bitcoin-etl

size.name: size
size.comment: The size of this transaction in bytes

virtual_size.name: virtual_size
virtual_size.comment: The virtual transaction size (differs from size for witness transactions)

version.name: version
version.comment: Protocol version specified in block which contained this transaction

lock_time.name: lock_time
lock_time.comment: Earliest time that miners can include the transaction in their hashing of the Merkle root to attach it in the latest block of the blockchain

block_hash.name: block_hash
block_hash.comment: Hash of the block which contains this transaction

block_number.name: block_number
block_number.comment: Number of the block which contains this transaction

block_timestamp.name: block_timestamp
block_timestamp.comment: Timestamp of the block which contains this transaction

block_timestamp_month.name: block_timestamp_month
block_timestamp_month.comment: Month of the block which contains this transaction

input_count.name: input_count
input_count.comment: The number of inputs in the transaction

output_count.name: output_count
output_count.comment: The number of outputs in the transaction

input_value.name: input_value
input_value.comment: Total value of inputs in the transaction

output_value.name: output_value
output_value.comment: Total value of outputs in the transaction

is_coinbase.name: is_coinbase
is_coinbase.comment: true if this transaction is a coinbase transaction

fee.name: fee
fee.comment: The fee paid by this transaction

inputs.type: ARRAY<STRUCT<index INT64, spent_transaction_hash STRING, spent_output_index INT64, script_asm STRING, script_hex STRING, sequence INT64, required_signatures INT64, type STRING, addresses ARRAY<STRING>, value NUMERIC>>
inputs.name: inputs

inputs.addresses.name: inputs.addresses
inputs.addresses.comment: Addresses which own the spent output

inputs.index.name: inputs.index
inputs.index.comment: 0-indexed number of an input within a transaction

inputs.required_signatures.name: inputs.required_signatures
inputs.required_signatures.comment: The number of signatures required to authorize the spent output

inputs.script_asm.name: inputs.script_asm
inputs.script_asm.comment: Symbolic representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

inputs.script_hex.name: inputs.script_hex
inputs.script_hex.comment: Hexadecimal representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

inputs.sequence.name: inputs.sequence
inputs.sequence.comment: A number intended to allow unconfirmed time-locked transactions to be updated before being finalized; not currently used except to disable locktime in a transaction

inputs.spent_output_index.name: inputs.spent_output_index
inputs.spent_output_index.comment: The index of the output this input spends

inputs.spent_transaction_hash.name: inputs.spent_transaction_hash
inputs.spent_transaction_hash.comment: The hash of the transaction which contains the output that this input spends

inputs.type.name: inputs.type
inputs.type.comment: The address type of the spent output

inputs.value.name: inputs.value
inputs.value.comment: The value in base currency attached to the spent output

outputs.type: ARRAY<STRUCT<index INT64, script_asm STRING, script_hex STRING, required_signatures INT64, type STRING, addresses ARRAY<STRING>, value NUMERIC>>
outputs.name: outputs

outputs.index.name: outputs.index
outputs.index.comment: 0-indexed number of an output within a transaction used by a later transaction to refer to that specific output

outputs.required_signatures.name: outputs.required_signatures
outputs.required_signatures.comment: The number of signatures required to authorize spending of this output

outputs.script_asm.name: outputs.script_asm
outputs.script_asm.comment: Symbolic representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

outputs.script_hex.name: outputs.script_hex
outputs.script_hex.comment: Hexadecimal representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

outputs.type.name: outputs.type
outputs.type.comment: The address type of the output

outputs.value.name: outputs.value
outputs.value.comment: The value in base currency attached to this output

num_rows.label: # Rows
num_rows.description: Approximate count of rows in this table

partitioning_type.label: Partitioned By
partitioning_type.description: The partitioning column for this table

num_bytes.label: Approximate Size
num_bytes.description: Approximate size of table as reported by BigQuery

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table
